text:
People will tell you, oh, beware of me,
They say I'm trouble, as you can plainly see.
I'll steal your sleep, make your eyes all red,
With my wild antics, you'll be sleep-deprived in bed.

I'll make you lose your senses, it's a guarantee,
Just one glance from me, and you'll start acting crazy.
I might sweep you off your feet with my charm,
Then, oh dear, you'll forget your way home on the farm.

I can cook up stories, oh, what a skill,
You'll never guess what's fiction and what's real.
No matter where you hide your fragile heart,
In just a few encounters, I'll make it depart.

So, be cautious, my friend, as you venture near,
For I'm a mischievous soul, it's quite clear.
But don't worry too much, it's all in fun,
Just be ready for a wild ride, 'cause I'm the one!
author: Om Prakash

text:
[Verse 1]
I found a love for me
Darling, just dive right in and follow my lead
Well, I found a girl, beautiful and sweet
Oh, I never knew you were the someone waiting for me
‘Cause we were just kids when we fell in love
Not knowing what it was
I will not give you up this time
But darling, just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own
And in your eyes you’re holding mine

[Chorus 1]
Baby, I’m dancing in the dark with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath
But you heard it, darling, you look perfect tonight

[Verse 2]
Well I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know
She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I’ll share her home
I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets
To carry love, to carry children of our own
We are still kids, but we’re so in love
Fighting against all odds
I know we’ll be alright this time
Darling, just hold my hand
Be my girl, I’ll be your man
I see my future in your eyes

[Chorus 2]
Baby, I’m dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
When you saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful
I don’t deserve this, darling, you look perfect tonight

Baby, I’m dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
Barefoot in the grass, listening to our favorite song
I have faith in what I see
Now I know I have met an angel to get with
And she looks perfect, no I don’t deserve this
You look perfect tonight

text:
100 reasons to stay alive:
1. to make your parents proud
2. to conquer your fears
3. to see your family again
4. to see your favourite artist live
5. to listen to music again
6. to experience a new culture
7. to make new friends
8. to inspire
9. to have your own children
10. to adopt your own pet
11. to make yourself proud
12. to meet your idols
13. to laugh until you cry
14. to feel tears of happiness
15. to eat your favourite food
16. to see your siblings grow
17. to pass school
18. to get tattoo
19. to smile until your cheeks hurt
20. to meet your internet friends
21. to find someone who loves you like you deserve
22. to eat ice cream on a hot day
23. to drink hot chocolate on a cold day
24. to see untouched snow in the morning
25. to see a sunset that sets the sky on fire
26. to see stars light up the sky
27. to read a book that changes your life
28. to see the flowers in the spring
29. to see the leaves change from green to brown 30. to travel abroad
31. to learn a new language
32. to learn to draw
33. to tell others your story in the hopes of helping them
34. Puppy kisses.
35. Baby kisses (the open mouthed kind when they smack their lips on your cheek).
36. Swear words and the release you feel when you say them.
37. Trampolines.
38. Ice cream.
39. Stargazing.
40. Cloud watching.
41. Taking a shower and then sleeping in clean sheets.
42. Receiving thoughtful gifts.
43. "I saw this and thought of you."
44. The feeling you get when someone you love says, "I love you."
45. The relief you feel after crying.
46. Sunshine.
47. The feeling you get when someone is listening to you/giving you their full attention
48. Your future wedding.
49. Your favorite candy bar.
50. New clothes.
51. Witty puns
52. Really good bread.
53. Holding your child in your arms for the first time.
54. Completing a milestone (aka going to college, graduating college, getting married, 55. The kind of dreams where you wake up and can't stop smiling.
56. The smell before and after it rains
57. The sound of rain against a rooftop.
58. The feeling you get when you're dancing.
59. The person (or people that mean the most to you. Stay alive for them.
60. Trying out new recipes.
61. The feeling you get when your favorite song comes on the radio.
62. The rush you get when you step onto a stage
63. You have to share your voice and talents and knowledge with the world because they are so valuable.
64 Breakfast in bed
65. Getting a middle seat in the movie theater.
66. Breakfast for dinner (because it's so much better at night than in the morning).
67. Pray (if you are religious)
68. Forgiveness.
69. Water balloon fights.
70. New books by your favorite authors
71. Fireflies.
72. Birthdays.
73. Realizing that someone loves you.
74. Spending the day with someone you
85. Being wrapped up in a warm bed.
86. Someone's skin against yours
87. Holding hands.
88. The kind of hugs when you can feel a weight being lifted off your shoulders. The kind of hug where your breath syncs with the other person's, and you feel like the only two people in the world.
89. Singing off key with your best friends.
90. Road trips
91. Spontaneous adventures.
92. The feeling of sand beneath your toes.
93. The feeling when the first ocean wave rolls up and envelops your toes and ankles and knees.
94. Thunderstorms.
95. Your first (or hundredth) trip to Disneyland.
96. The taste of vour favorite food.
97. The child-like feeling you get on
Christmas morning.
98. The day when everything finally goes your
wav.
99. Compliments and praise
100. to look on this moment in 10 years time and realise vou did it.
Ps: Never forget you are a beatiful person 🥰
Life is so beatiful so live. live like no one else exist, live for yourself, don't care of bad people, you are strong, i love you ❤
Keep going😊

text:
Encontré un amor para mí, 
querida, solo lánzate de cabeza y sígueme.
Bueno, encontré una chica, hermosa y dulce.
Oh, nunca pensé que tú eras
ese "alguien" esperándome.
Porque éramos solo unos chiquillos 
cuando nos enamoramos, 
sin saber lo que era.
Esta vez no renunciaré a ti, 
pero cariño, solo bésame lentamente.
Tu corazón es todo lo que poseo,
y en tus ojos, tú sostienes el mío.

Cariño, estoy bailando en la oscuridad, 
contigo entre mis brazos, 
descalzos sobre la hierba, 
escuchando nuestra canción favorita.
Cuando dijiste que te veías hecha un desastre, 
yo susurré por debajo de mi respiración, 
pero tú lo oíste, querida:
Esta noche estás perfecta (lit: te ves perfecta).

Bueno, encontré una mujer, 
más fuerte que nadie a quien conozca.
Ella comparte mis sueños, 
espero algún día compartir su hogar.
Encontré un amor
para llevar más que solo mis secretos, 
para llevar amor, para llevar a nuestros hijos.
Aún somos unos críos, pero estamos tan enamorados, 
luchando contra todo pronóstico, 
sé que esta vez estaremos bien.
Cariño, solo toma mi mano, 
sé mi chica, yo seré tu hombre.
Veo mi futuro en tus ojos.

Cariño, estoy bailando en la oscuridad, 
contigo entre mis brazos, 
descalzos sobre la hierba, 
escuchando nuestra canción favorita.
Cuando te vi con ese vestido, 
tan hermosa.
No me merezco esto, cariño.
Esta noche estás perfecta.

Cariño, estoy bailando en la oscuridad, 
contigo entre mis brazos, 
descalzos sobre la hierba, 
escuchando nuestra canción favorita.
Tengo fe en lo que veo, 
ahora sé que he conocido a un ángel en persona, 
y ella se ve perfecta.
No, yo no me merezco esto. 
Esta noche estás perfecta. 

Ed Sheeran - Perfecta

The most barbaric disease that affects 220,000,000 females that could be described as drop dead gorgeous super beautiful heroines that save the world called Endometriosis has no cure. It just has barbaric treatments which are useful in only 25% of Endo warriors causing pain that has been described as being like giving birth 4 to 5 times weekly for an Endo warriors entire high school,college and working lives when it could have been removed early in life when it is entirely in the reproductive system before it spreads throughout the body to places no surgical equipment, medicines nor any Endo specialist can get to, constantly reqrowing.

Where by the time an Endo warrior enters menopause when estrogen stop fertilizes Endo, almost all have had at least 10 to up to 20 either excision (removal) or ablation (burning off the top) surgeries at a cost per failed attempt of $10,000 with insurance for those fortunate to cover to $50,000 without it costing each Endo warrior up to an accumulated 3 years off work for recoveries and an additional two years in lost time at work, leading to a near impossibility of ever achieving 1,250 fmla hours and almost always getting fired asking for ADA which simply isn’t accomodatable and an average of 25 to 30 jobs.

I am calling on a national movement to create a simple 15 minute naval injection of a fluid that would reach to every organ surface and even penetrate organs to kill ademyosis and leave a lifetime protective coating at a cost of less than $100 and the same recovery time to resume daily activities (mostly work) as quickly as covid vaccines that were invented for several variants at no cost and distributed to virtually the entire world in months.

The same intensity given to covid that individuals could have prevented should be equaled to Endo warriors who got the horror by being born female and with abnormal levels of estrogen that fertilizes the endo to them.That while blesses the world with overpowering beauty, prettiness, radiance , picturesque professionalism, overwhelming intelligence, talent, skills,dedication all used for unfathomable morality,ethics, wholesomeness and virtue and seemingly every positive external and internal characteristic.

It takes about 12 years brushed off by doctors who know nothing about Endometriosis getting false diagnoisis’ and needless tests. Starting with the first complaint to parents and teachers in middle school or even elementary school about pelvic pains, especially inserting tampons, excessive painful urination and defecation, abnormal amounts of period length and discharge. Where uneducated parents and teachers view their young girls and just being hysterical, trying to get attention or wondering, what are they trying to jet out of this month like she does every month. Leading to discipline and yelling at, instead of finding out what is wrong with her and getting her an ultra sound to detect ovarian cysts which are the primary indicator of Endometriosis. For which if detected and treated in the first few years of periods can be successfully removed with excision surgery in its entirety when only in the reproductive system resulting in a normal pain free life with but a child hood trauma and not by the time when they are even 15 when it has spread so much that no surgical equipment nor any Endo specialist can get to, leading to a high school, college, working life until menopause of excruciating daily pain that almost all Endo mothers claim is worse than child birth. By the time an Endo warrior begins college the pain that was once only a stomach pain where the all the endo was, has grown everywhere cementing itself on every organ along with whole body pain. Each so called “Gold Standard” results in less pain relief, longer recovery times and thus more time without pay.

With good parents and teachers who won’t just tell their crying students to just get back to class and stop faking it, which is what virtually all that is done in schools, who observe the obvious that a young girl is a fantastic student and person, ready for school and maybe a job an hour before needed with a life full of extra circular activities Yet ever three weeks or so for about a week she is still in bed at 7:10 has to painfully urinate seemingly all the time and torture like removing and inserting tampons and a bladder so filled she can’t make it to the end of class without bleeding  through clothes. A young girl won’t suffer. If the parents do medical research instead of discipline for being hysterical to find the reason for their daughter’s suffering , she would never endured in the first place.

When estrogen production ends , the scar tissue from the burning off of ablation surgery or the digging into tissue over and over for almost all leads to pain for life. The Trojan horse promoted by doctors being hysterectomies or birth control only eliminates endo reqrowth in 15% to 20% percent of those barbarically conned like was done in the horribly inaccurate scenes in Grey’s Anatomy season 18 episode 10 where a endo warrior just goes into Grey Sloan the doctors immediately assume Endo and that afternoon do a lap and prescribe birth control and pain meds-all in a single visit. Where for every single Endo warrior the cruel voyage to a lap is at least 12 years of barbaric women’s medical gaslighting.

And as Endo Warrior Victoria Williams and my inspiration claims, once a woman comes forward seeking ADA at work, they are instead given less hours, less responsibility and thus less pay leading to what Meghhin cries out in her video,,,”I only have so much money and I spend it all on doctors that aren’t helping.” Or her best line to her doctor “I am paying you thousands and thousands of dollars and you can’t even tell me I have Endo and not just Allen Masters Syndrome. I pay them thousands of dollars and they have one job and they say they don’t want to risk looking at al the places, but someone who is a specialist should have the skill and expertise to go to difficult places.”

And while non Endo people have runs, dog walks and workouts before a long day of pleasurable work then going out with friends to some fun place,an Endo warrior with no dog or cat because they can’t afford the deposit or risk unpayable vet bills, starts the day with a hot cbd bubble bath, then loading up on prescription pain pills and the con job birth control pills which just screw up hormones, just to make it to lunch where they take more pain pills and heating pads and just hope to make it home safe and not have to stop in an ER or rest in someone’s driveway to make it home to get their medical marijuana to help them survive another day having already used up most of their sick days for the week, terrified how many pills it will take tomorrow, desperately struggling for days off to sleep and cry while their coworkers are hiking, going on weekend trips, reading and watching Hallmark movies while Endo warriors read and watch medical journals about how the hysterectomy one of the dozens of gaslighting doctors told her would be a cure.

And the hardships of painful sex or any type of pelvic contact ruins most male relationships that result in many break ups a year as soon as sex is desired, leading them to seek the unconditional love of cats (my most inspirational Endo cats, Jinx, Belle and Bo and dogs(a yorkie called Cooper).

Endo is so common yet only 20% of primary care physicians know even one symptom and there are but 100 excision specialists in the country and only 200 in the world due to the extra years of training it takes without getting paid instead of providing other people medical care.
